issue.title: [Python] Expose CpuInfo for informational / debugging purposes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9396](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9396). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This would help to see what CpuInfo says about the current processor
